name: Interstate 35W/35E
description: Discover pairs of words made by swapping state abbreviations.

name: M-37 (East Beltline)
description: Discover words that can be made by putting together state abbreviations.

name: Puerto Rico Highway 1
description: Discover words that transform into new words when PR is added to them.

name: Texas Highway Loop 12
description: Discover words that make use of a state's abbreviation twice.

name: U.S. Route 131
description: Discover words that transform into new words when a state is added to them.

name: Farm to Market Rd. 1938
description: Discover phrases that are made by putting together state abbreviations.

name: California Highway 99
description: Discover trios of words where each adds a new state abbreviation to build on the last.
